name: have_posts
about: Whether current WordPress query has results to loop over.

name: the_post
about: Iterate the post index in the loop.

name: the_permalink
about: Displays the permalink for the current post.

name: has_post_thumbnail
about: Determines whether a post has an image attached.

name: the_post_thumbnail
about: Display the post thumbnail.

name: the_title
about: Display or retrieve the current post title with optional markup.

name: the_author_posts_link
about: Displays an HTML link to the author page of the current postâ€™s author with his name

name: the_excerpt
about: Display the post excerpt.

name: the_content
about: Display the post content.

name: get_previous_posts_link
about: Retrieves the previous posts page link.

name: previous_posts_link
about: Displays the previous posts page link.

name: get_next_posts_link
about: Retrieves the next posts page link.

name: next_posts_link
about: Displays the next posts page link.

name: get_previous_post_link
about: Retrieves the previous post link that is adjacent to the current post.

name: previous_post_link
about: Displays the previous post link that is adjacent to the current post.

name: get_next_post_link
about: Retrieves the next post link that is adjacent to the current post.

name: next_post_link
about: Displays the next post link that is adjacent to the current post.

name: paginate_links
about: Retrieve paginated link for archive post pages.

name: get_pagenum_link
about: Retrieves the link for a page number.

name: count_user_posts
about: Number of posts user has written.
